# [Interview #1097: Orem Signing Report - Zas678, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1097#5)

#### Question

Are we ever going to see a spren viewpoint?

#### Brandon Sanderson (Paraphrased)

Yes it's likely.

#### Question

A book where the flashbacks are spren?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Probably not. Or it's not planned right now.
